title: Redwood National and State Parks: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Backcountry Camping Free permits are required for camping at all designated backcountry camps in Redwood National and State Parks, available from any visitor center (except Prairie Creek Visitor Center).  Â    Special Use Permits Commercial filming and small, medium, and large events (including weddings) held in Redwood National & State Parks require a permit. Contact us or call 707-465-7307 for more information on special use permits. Scattering human remains also requires a Special Use Permit. Click here for more information.
